means: 杳无人迹的，未受践踏的
折回，退回( untread的过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: A grand and almost untrodden field of inquiry will be opened.
sentence.Network_cn: 一片广大而尚无人迹的研究领域将被开辟.

sentence.Network_en: He swung off the path and plunged into the untrodden places of the wood.
sentence.Network_cn: 他拐了一个弯,离开小径,朝林中沓无人迹的地方走去.
